manipulations.insert_object: Insert a disco ball hanging from the center of the ceiling, reflecting light realistically onto the surrounding surfaces.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the light fixture and emergency exit sign from the upper right corner of the black wall, seamlessly blending the wall.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background behind the two men with a bustling cityscape at night, maintaining the depth of field.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain and reflections to the ceiling, suggesting a stormy night outside the club.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the material of the tank top on the left to appear as if it is made of shimmering gold fabric, respecting folds.
